keywords.DESCRIPTION: Minions abandon combat without their leader.
At the end of turn, take damage.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
At the end of turn, gain #yBlock.
At the end of turn, gain Block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1.
Upon receiving attack damage, gains #yBlock.
At the end of turn, heal #yHP, then reduce #yRegeneration by #b1.
Gain #rStrength. At the end of turn, lose #rStrength.
#yBlock is not removed at the start of turn.
Damage ignores all means of defense.
Once enough is accumulated, playing a Clow Card or Sakura Card will trigger an additional special effect of that card.
Enter this state when the #yMagick #yCharge reaches a threshold. The next non-ability, non-charging Clow card will have a special effect.
The magic card created by Clow Reed, which can be collected in a variety of ways.

A special card obtained by converting a #yClow #yCard of the same name using #yThe #yTurn. NL #yUniqueness, there can only be one #ySakura #yCard of the same name in the master deck. NL Cannot be upgraded and does not trigger #yMagick #yCharge effects. When played, add one Void to the draw pile.
A #ySpell that converts a #yClow #yCard to a #ySakura #yCard.
A special type of card that does not belong to the #yClow #yCard, most of which are consumptive cards.
Light Element is the upper element of the #yEarthy #yElement and the #yFirey Element, which can trigger the effect of both those at the same time.
Dark Element is the upper element of the #yWatery #yElement and the #yWindy Element, which can trigger the effect of both those at the same time.
Earthy Element Card. NL Enter earthy-element-state, when played in charging-state. NL Gain #bBlocks by using it in the #yEarthy #yElement #yState.
When using #yEarthy #yElement #yCard, gain 4 #bBlocks.
Earthy Element Card. NL Enter watery-element-state, when played in charging-state. NL Gain #bEnergy by using it in the #yWatery #yElement #yState.
For every #b2 #yWatery #yElement #yCards played, gain #b1 energy.
Firey Element Card. NL Enter firey-element-state, when played in charging-state. NL Deal damage to all enemies by using it in the #yFirey #yElement #yState.
When using #yFirey #yElement #yCard, deal 4 damage to all enemies.
Windy Element Card. NL Enter windy-element-state, when played in charging-state. NL Draw card by using it in the #yWindy #yElement #yState.
For every #b2 #yWindy #yElement #yCards played, draw #b1 card.
The released card will become #b0 cost, all effects will be increased by #b50%, and Ethereal and Exhaust will be added to the card.

Convert the #yClow #yCard to the #ySakura #yCard. NL It can be converted only if the same name #ySakura #yCard does not exist in the master deck. NL After the conversion is successful, the target #yClow #yCard will be removed from the master deck, and the same name #ySakura #yCard will be added.
Basic Strike Card.
A card that can copy another card from the hand.
A #yClow #yCard that cannot be played. Draw an additional card when the card is drawn, will only trigger the card effect when consumed.
A #yClow #yCard that can reduce the cost of the other cards in the hand.
A #yClow #yCard that can get stronger as the battle goes on.
A #yClow #yCard that can deal multiple damage to a single target.
A #yClow #yCard that can deal a lot of damage to random enemies.
A #yClow #yCard that can disrupt the enemy's defenses.
Kill the enemy can get recharge, when the recharge conditions are met, you can convert the #yClow #yCard to the #ySakura #yCard.
Consumptive attack card that can change element.
Consumable attack card of the #yFirey #yElement that deals damage to a single target.
Consumable attack card of the #yEarthy #yElement that deals damage to a random target.
Consumable attack card of the #yWindy #yElement that deals damage several times to a single target.
Consumable attack card of the #yWatery #yElement that deals damage to all enemies.
The target falls asleep and wakes up when hurt. The target will restore all health and gain 2 #yWeakness if it naturally wakes up.
After use, it will be removed from the master deck. And the temporary card does not work.
When you draw this card, draw an extra card.
When this card exhausts another card, add a copy of this card into your discard pile.
Includes Blocks, Metallicize, Plated Armor, Artifact, Thorns, Buffer, Intangible, Malleable, Barricade.
When consumed, damage all enemies.
Gain Block when exhasuts.
When exhausted by The-Song, extra apply its effect.
At the start of each battle, the cost is reduced by 1.
This card can only be effective when it comes from the combat bonus. The temporary one gained during the battle will not have an effect.
When playing, add the same card to your hand.
Interrupts the current action of target if it is not a boss or elite.
It can only be played in Charging State.
When there are less than 4 cards of the same name in the master deck, the attribute will be increased by 20% for each less card, up to 60% at most.
At the end of the round, randomly remove the cards from the deck.
